content: HAS-B-105 HDG Anchor rod High-performance anchor rod for injectable adhesive mortars and HVU adhesive capsule (carbon steel, ASTM F1554 grade 105, hot-dip galvanized) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Anchor rods & elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Chisel-tip anchor rod for use with HVU adhesive capsules and for easy insertion when using with Hilti HIT injectable adhesive anchors Designed for use with HVU adhesive capsules in solid concrete or with Hilti HIT injectable adhesive mortar in various base materials Custom lengths and additional diameters up to 2 Â½ available upon request Head marking for easy verification of steel grade and rod length, even after installation Free of oil and other contamination for the highest performance with Hilti HIT injectable adhesive anchoring systems Applications Suitable for fastenings in concrete and some other base materials in combination with the relevant Hilti HIT injectable adhesive mortar Suitable for ductile fastening points with predictable steel failure in seismic-relevant applications Suitable for fastenings in concrete in combination with Hilti HVU capsules ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, HDG (Hot-Dip Galvanized)/Sherardized Base materials: Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked) PROFIS Software: Yes Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, HDG (Hot-Dip Galvanized)/Sherardized | Base materials | Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked) | PROFIS Software | Yes | Approvals / Test reports | ICC-ES report (concrete), ICC-ES report (masonry) | Cleaning procedures | Automatic Cleaning (SafeSet Hollow Drill Bit), Compressed-Air Cleaning, Manual Cleaning | Type of fixing | Pre-fastening ### ITEMS- 2197939 -
